OrgName.entry: FOXHILL/BIRLEY CARR LIVE AT HOME SCHEME

Desc.entry: Offers a befriending and home visiting service to older people aged 60 years and over in Fox Hill, Parson Cross and Wadsley Bridge to help them live independently. Can arrange help with shopping. Also provides a weekly lunch club, an information service and organises local trips and outings. Affiliated to MHA Care Group. Self or any referral.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 12noon-2pm (healthy living group), Wed at 12noon (lunch club); Thurs 12noon-2.30pm (activity day)
